text: ansbu 'adeia'akum labayhm, hu aedl wa'aqwam eind allh, fa'iin lam taelamuu aba'ahum alhqyqyyn fadeuhum 'idhana bakhwwat aldiyn alty tjmekm bhm, fa'iinahum 'iikhwanikum fi aldiyn wamawalikum fyh, walays ealaykum 'iithm fima wqetm fih min khata lm ttemdwh, wa'iinama yuaakhidhukum allah 'iidha temdtm dhalik. wakan allah ghfwrana liman akhta, rhymana liman tab min dhnbh
